input_email_body:
Subject: Guidance on Securing Medical Data in PHP 8.0 for Hospital Environments

Ensuring the security of medical data in a PHP 8.0 hospital setting demands meticulous attention. Could you please offer advice on data encryption and secure storage methods?. My contact number is +86-10-8500-1234.
